articles.title: Supreme Courtâ€™s Term Yields Triumphs for Trump
articles.description: The New York Times reports that the Supreme Court's recent term has resulted in significant victories for former President Donald Trump.

articles.title: Russia Presses Advantage in Troop Numbers as Front Line Expands
articles.description: The Wall Street Journal reports that Russia is leveraging its numerical superiority in troops to expand the front line in ongoing conflicts.

articles.title: IDF Pounds Gaza, Killing 60, as Ceasefire Talks Gain Momentum
articles.description: The Jerusalem Post reports that the Israel Defense Forces have conducted operations in Gaza resulting in 60 fatalities, coinciding with progressing ceasefire negotiations.
